mapper.select: select r.user_id, r.revw_id, r.cnts_id, r.revw_body, c.cnts_title, r.revw_visib_stat, r.up_date from REVW r join CNTS c on c.cnts_id = r.cnts_id where r.user_id = #{user_id}
select cw.cnts_id, cw.user_id, cw.in_date, c.cnts_postr_img, c.cnts_visib_stat, c.cnts_title from CNTS_WISH cw join CNTS c on c.cnts_id = cw.cnts_id where cw.user_id = #{user_id}

select p.user_id, p.bbs_id, b.bbs_nm, p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_view_cnt, p.post_reply_cnt, p.up_date, p.post_visib from POST p join BBS b on p.bbs_id = b.bbs_id where p.user_id = #{user_id} order by up_date desc;
select u.user_id, u.prf_img, u.nic, u.dopa_exp, u.dopa_point, u.fav_genre1, u.sex, u.btdt from USER u where u.user_id = #{user_id}
select i.item_img from ITEM i join POSSESION p on i.item_id = p.item_id WHERE p.user_id = #{user_id} and p.equip_stat = 1
select i.item_id, i.list_id, i.item_nm, i.item_img, p.user_id, p.equip_stat from ITEM i join POSSESION p on i.item_id = p.item_id where user_id = #{user_id} and i.list_id = 1
select i.item_id, i.list_id, i.item_nm, i.item_img, p.user_id, p.equip_stat from ITEM i join POSSESION p on i.item_id = p.item_id where user_id = #{user_id} and i.list_id = 2

select p.pnt_use_id, p.pchs_item_id, p.use_stat, p.pnt, p.user_id, i.list_id, i.grd_nm, i.item_nm, i.item_img, p.in_date from PNT_USE_DETL p join ITEM i on p.pchs_item_id = i.item_id where p.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY p.in_date desc
